This game is so much better than Half-life 2: Deathmatch. This game is so much more funner and funny. Custom maps with secret entrances to better weapons. Really fun and could play for hours. Die a lot tho. Maybe add more health.

funny story. a map got infested with bots saying things like "do not forget the cake" and like "i don't blame you." and most annoying they said it a lot and didn't say anything else. then the map just added redux to the name. and i never saw the bots again. than the map just never showed up for me ever since. yet still a great thing to buy.

[h1][b][u]Half-Life Deathmatch: Source[/u][/b][/h1]

[b]tl;dr =[/b] Multiplayer portion of Half-Life: Source.

[b]Points:[/b] ‚ûä ‚ûã ‚ûå ‚ûç ‚ûé ‚ûÖ ‚ûÜ ‚ûá ‚ûà ‚ûâ    [i](5 out of 10)[/i]
[b]Rating:[/b] [u]Average.[/u]
[b]Verdict:[/b] [u]Wait for a good deal.[/u]
[b]Seal of approval:[/b] [u]No.[/u]

[b]Story:[/b] Multiplayer deathmatch therefore no story.

[b]Gameplay:[/b] Simple FPS-mechanics, pick up a gun and shoot.

[b]Difficulty:[/b] Depending on your skill and the skill of your enemies.

[b]Features:[/b] All the weapons you know and love from Half-Life.

[b]Duration:[/b] Open end.

[b]Improvements:[/b] Nothing.

[i]This review was written by me. I purchased the game myself and did not recieve a review copy. I did not get payed to review this game.[/i]

- MacTehn

This would be an amazing game if people actually played it. To this day, I love Half Life mechanics and weapons SO much. They've truly stood the test of time. But RIP. Guess I'll stick to TF2...
If you enjoy getting Tau Cannon'd through walls like I do then you might like it.

Not even gonna write a detailed review on this one as it is not worth it

-Tons of bugs
-Dead Community
-No Servers
-Bad mechanics
-Bad engine development

Don't waste time and money on this game
Play Half-Life Deathmatch (Gold Src) It's way better than this one and is very active to this day
